markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Clockwork Heels](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1266)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 22</row>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn shoes

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clockwork footwear features a marvelous mechanical heel built into the base to increase your speed. When you lean your weight onto your heel, a springboard triggers and pops out small metal wheels that propel you forward. You gain a +5-foot item bonus to your Speed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Clockwork Heels
